commands.name: adr
commands.description: Create a new Architecture Decision Record
commands.prompt:
Create a new ADR (Architecture Decision Record) following the template in docs/adr/adr-000-template.md. Ask me for:
1. The decision title
2. The context/problem
3. The decision made
4. Considered alternatives

Then create the ADR file with the next sequential number, update docs/adr/README.md, and reference it in docs/arc42/09_architecture_decisions.md if appropriate.

commands.name: doc
commands.prompt: Help me update the Arc42 documentation. Ask which section I want to update (1-12), then guide me through updating the relevant markdown file in docs/arc42/. Follow the Arc42 template structure and maintain consistency with existing documentation.

commands.name: arch-review
commands.prompt:
Review the current architecture and documentation:
1. Read all ADRs in docs/adr/
2. Check Arc42 sections 1-4 for completeness
3. Identify missing or outdated documentation
4. Suggest next steps for architecture refinement

Provide a summary of findings and recommendations.

commands.name: service-scaffold
commands.prompt:
Help me scaffold a new microservice following PaperlessCore conventions:
1. Ask for service name (must start with PLC.)
2. Ask for service type (Node.js function or C# service)
3. Create appropriate directory structure
4. Add basic configuration files
5. Update documentation

Follow KISS principles and Clean Architecture patterns.

commands.name: todo-review
commands.description: Review project TODOs and next steps
commands.prompt:
Review the project status:
1. Check README.md for documented next steps
2. Review Arc42 sections marked as TBD
3. Check for incomplete ADRs
4. Suggest prioritized next steps

Provide a concise summary of what should be tackled next.
